title: rustc debug panic `Panic index out of bounds running` on linux

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
CentOS7.3 : relase is OK, debug Panic. MacOS: debug and release is OK. build command ```rust RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build --color=always --all --all-targets ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.44.1 (c7087fe00 2020-06-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: c7087fe00d2ba919df1d813c040a5d47e43b0fe7 commit-date: 2020-06-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.44.1 LLVM version: 9.0 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 13 but the index is 4294967295', src/librustc_span/hygiene.rs:203:9 stack backtrace: 0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace at
